ru.solodovnikov.rxlocationmanager

Class PermissionTransformer

  • BasePermissionTransformer
    • ru.solodovnikov.rxlocationmanager.PermissionBehavior

  • public class PermissionTransformer
extends BasePermissionTransformer

    Transformer used to request runtime permissions

    Call RxLocationManager.onRequestPermissionsResult inside your android.app.Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult to get request permissions results in the transformer.
